sentences.sContent: A judge agreed to extradite him to Texas.
sentences.sCn: 一位法官同意将他引渡到德克萨斯州。

remMethod.val: ex + trad(递交) + ite → 把…递交出去 → 引渡

trans.tranOther: to use a legal process to send someone who may be guilty of a crime back to the country where the crime happened in order to judge them in a court of law
